If you haven't made any payment yet, it's safe to proceed with the cancellation.

message.description: Your e-mail address has not been verified. Check your mailbox for the activation e-mail.
message.success: New activation e-mail has been sent

accounting.title: Your Business Accounting, Done Right — By the Team Behind Otutu
accounting.intro: Business accounting is never one-size-fits-all. Every company has its own structure, processes, history, and reporting needs. Getting it right means going beyond basic setup—cleaning historical data, fixing inconsistencies, classifying complex transactions, and ensuring your financials truly reflect reality. Otutu was built to give businesses full control over their accounting. For organizations that need hands-on support, we offer bespoke accounting services powered directly by Otutu—combining our platform with expert-led configuration and data refinement to deliver accurate, audit-ready results.

tailored.title: Tailored to Your Business
tailored.description: No two businesses operate the same way. We work directly with your real data—bank statements, invoices, bills, vendor records, payroll summaries, and historical spreadsheets—and tailor every step to match how your business actually runs. Whether you’re migrating from another accounting system, cleaning years of messy records, setting up multi-entity books, or aligning your accounts with reporting requirements, our approach adapts to your specific needs, industry, and scale.

scripts.title: Built on Otutu, Customized for You
scripts.description: Otutu serves as the core accounting engine for this service. We configure charts of accounts, workflows, reporting structures, and automations specifically for your business, ensuring your books are accurate, explainable, and consistent. You receive not just clean data, but a properly structured Otutu setup that you can continue using confidently. Everything we configure is transparent and reproducible, so your accounting remains stable long after the engagement ends.

hands_on.title: A True Hands-On Service
hands_on.description: This is not self-serve software support. This is a professional service. We work directly with you to identify edge cases, resolve data gaps, reconcile accounts, correct misclassifications, and explain every figure in your financial statements. From historical cleanup to ongoing accounting support, we handle the details so your books make sense and stand up to scrutiny.

privacy.title: Privacy, Security, and Trust
privacy.description: Your financial data is treated with the highest level of care. All work is handled securely using controlled environments and strict access policies. Your data is never shared with third parties, and confidentiality is guaranteed throughout the engagement. Once the work is completed, access is revoked and data handling follows strict retention and deletion standards—your privacy and peace of mind always come first.

formalization.title: Our Approach
formalization.description: Otutu was designed to give businesses clarity, structure, and confidence in their financial operations. But not every business has the time or internal expertise to clean historical records, reconcile accounts, or design a future-proof accounting setup. Our bespoke accounting service exists for those moments. We work with founders, finance teams, accountants, and growing companies to bring order to their books—making them clean, compliant, and ready for growth. Not through generic templates, but through deep understanding of business operations and a commitment to doing accounting properly.

contact.message: Or email us at {email} with a brief overview of your business and accounting needs.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.intro: Business accounting can be complex. We make it simple by doing it right. This is a premium, hands-on service focused on delivering clarity, accuracy, and long-term value.

initial_consultation.title: Initial Consultation
initial_consultation.description: The initial consultation typically lasts 1–3 hours. We review your existing accounting setup, financial data, workflows, and reporting requirements. You’ll receive a clear assessment of your current state, key issues, and a concrete plan for moving forward.

custom_quote.title: Custom Quote for the Full Engagement
custom_quote.description: After the consultation, we provide a tailored proposal based on the actual scope and complexity of your needs. Whether it’s historical cleanup, full system migration, multi-year accounting, or ongoing support, pricing is transparent and based on real effort—not vague estimates.

transparent_fair.title: Transparent and Fair
transparent_fair.description: If you choose not to proceed beyond the consultation, that’s completely fine. You’ll still walk away with valuable insights and a clearer understanding of your accounting situation.

important_note.title: Important note
important_note.paragraph1: This is an accounting setup, cleanup, and data preparation service. We help organize, reconcile, and structure your financial records so you and your advisors have a complete and accurate view of your business.
important_note.paragraph2: We do not provide tax advice or file tax returns. For tax filing and statutory submissions, we recommend working with a licensed tax professional in your jurisdiction. We’re happy to collaborate directly with your accountant or auditor using the data prepared in Otutu.

 Proceed only if you intend to purchase premium and unlock the premium features of the application.

local_app.description: Record and manage transactions in multiple currencies with automatic conversion and up-to-date exchange rates.
local_app.title: Multi-Currency

open_source.description: Securely manage multiple companies with full data isolation, built for accountants, agencies, and growing businesses.
open_source.title: Multi-Tenancy Architecture

own_your_data.description: Enterprise-grade double-entry accrual accounting with automatic journal entries to keep your books accurate and balanced.
own_your_data.title: Double-Entry Accounting

secure_platform.description: Generate essential reports including Profit & Loss, Balance Sheet, and Cash Flow for better financial decisions.
secure_platform.title: Financial Reports

asset_and_liabilities.description: Easily create and manage products and services with flexible categorization and intuitive selection. Configure offerings for both sales and purchases, with automatic account mapping to ensure income and expenses are always recorded correctly.
asset_and_liabilities.title: Smart Product & Service Setup

net_worth_over_time.description: Reduce manual errors with built-in tax, discount, and validation logic. Otutu automatically applies the correct adjustments while keeping you in control with alerts and bulk management tools.
net_worth_over_time.title: Automated Pricing, Tax & Control

dashboard.subtitle: Comprehensive offerings management system that supports both products and services with flexible configurations for sellable and purchasable items.
dashboard.title: Offerings

history_events.subtitle: End-to-end sales process management from initial quotes to final payments, with comprehensive client relationship tracking and automated recurring billing capabilities.
history_events.title: Sales

comprehensive.title: Invoices
comprehensive.description: Create professional invoices with flexible line items, real-time tax and discount calculations, multi-currency support, and complete payment and status tracking from draft to settlement.

categorization.title: Estimates
categorization.description: Send clear, professional estimates with approval tracking, automatic expiration handling, and one-click conversion to invoices while preserving all line item details.

customizable.title: Recurring Invoices
customizable.description: Automate repeat billing with flexible schedules, reusable templates, and automatic invoice generation assigned to specific clients.

filter.title: Clients
filter.description: Manage client relationships with real-time balance tracking, credit limits, multiple contacts, and a complete history of invoices, payments, and transactions.

csv_export.title: Sales Dashboard Insights
csv_export.description: Get instant visibility into unpaid and overdue invoices, average payment times, and monthly revenue trends to monitor sales performance and cash flow.

evm_protocols.subtitle: Comprehensive banking system with transaction synchronization, reconciliation, and multi-bank support for complete financial oversight.
evm_protocols.title: Banking

multi_chain_support.title: Bank Accounts
multi_chain_support.description: Manage multi-currency bank and cash accounts across multiple financial institutions with real-time balance visibility, account type support, and comprehensive transaction tracking.

automatic_activity_importing.title: Bank Feeds
automatic_activity_importing.description: Automatically import transactions from connected banks with smart categorization, duplicate detection, and continuous feed synchronization for up-to-date records.

defi_balances.title: Reconciliation
defi_balances.description: Match bank transactions to accounting records with intelligent matching, batch reconciliation, discrepancy reporting, and a complete audit trail.

staking_yield.title: Financial Operations
staking_yield.description: Record and manage core financial movements including transfers, deposits, withdrawals, and internal adjustments with full ledger integration and traceability.

historical_data.title: Cash Flow Monitoring
historical_data.description: Track available balances, inflows, and outflows across all bank accounts to maintain clear visibility into liquidity and day-to-day financial health.

exchanges.detail: Record all transaction types with automatic double-entry journals and full audit trails. Manage a structured chart of accounts with accurate balance tracking and clear categorization. Generate professional financial statements and in-depth analytical reports with confidence.
exchanges.subtitle: Comprehensive accounting system with detailed transaction management, financial reporting, and complete audit trails for regulatory compliance.
exchanges.title: Accounting

hero.motto: A powerful modern accounting platform with full double-entry accrual accounting, built for professional financial management.
hero.title: Accounting & Tax Infrastructure

notes.line_2: Once the whole amount is sent and processed by our system, then a receipt will be sent to your email and your subscription will be activated.

step_3.upgrade_plan_description: Upgrade charges are calculated as the price difference between plans, prorated for your remaining subscription period. You'll only pay the difference for the time left in your current billing cycle.

wallet.notice: You can pay directly via your wallet or manually send the exact amount to the following address above. Once the whole amount is sent and processed by our system, then a receipt will be sent to your email and your subscription will be activated.
wallet.paid_notice_1: If you already have made a transaction you don't need to do anything more.
wallet.paid_notice_2: You will be notified about your subscription via e-mail as soon as your transaction is confirmed.

dex_support.detail: Otutu is built with accountability at its core. Every transaction, adjustment, reconciliation, and payment is recorded with a complete audit trail, including timestamps and user activity tracking. From invoices and bills to bank reconciliations and journal entries, Otutu ensures your records are always review-ready—whether for internal reviews, external audits, or regulatory compliance.
dex_support.title: Audit-Ready by Design

graphs_and_statistics.detail: Otutu goes beyond basic summaries. It delivers professional financial statements and analytical reports that help you understand not just what happened, but why it happened. Generate balance sheets, income statements, trial balances, receivables aging, payables aging, and detailed account activity reports with confidence. Sales and purchase dashboards provide insights into cash flow, payment performance, outstanding balances, and financial trends—so decisions are driven by data, not assumptions.
graphs_and_statistics.title: Advanced Reporting for Real Business Decisions

history.detail: Otutu is built for businesses that operate beyond a single currency or market. With native multi-currency support across sales, purchases, banking, and accounting, Otutu automatically handles currency conversions, exchange rate tracking, and accurate reporting. Whether you invoice international clients, pay foreign vendors, or manage multiple bank accounts, Otutu keeps your financials consistent and transparent.
history.title: Designed for Global and Multi-Currency Operations

premium_defi.detail: Otutu automates the repetitive and error-prone parts of accounting so you can focus on running your business. From real-time tax and discount calculations to recurring invoices, automated journal entries, bank feeds, and smart reconciliation, Otutu minimizes manual input while maintaining full control and accuracy. Automation is applied thoughtfully—enhancing productivity without hiding critical financial details.
premium_defi.title: Intelligent Automation That Reduces Manual Work

premium_staking.detail: Otutu is designed around enterprise-grade double-entry accrual accounting, the same accounting foundation used by professional firms and regulated businesses worldwide. Every transaction automatically generates balanced journal entries, ensuring accuracy, consistency, and compliance from day one. With a structured chart of accounts, real-time balance tracking, and strict debit/credit enforcement, your financial records remain clean, auditable, and reliable as your business grows.
premium_staking.title: Built on Professional Accounting Standards

premium_features.subtitle: Otutu is built for businesses that take accounting seriously. It is not a lightweight bookkeeping tool, and it is not a bloated enterprise ERP. Otutu sits exactly where modern businesses need it: professional-grade accounting standards, intelligent automation, and clear financial visibility—without unnecessary complexity.
premium_features.title: Why Choose Otutu

pnl_explanation.title: Bills
pnl_explanation.description: Manage vendor bills with precision using a structured bill management system built for professional accounting workflows. Create detailed bills with line-item breakdowns, automatic tax and discount calculations, and multi-currency support. Track due dates, schedule payments, record partial or bulk payments, and link bills to purchase order references for better traceability. Maintain a complete payment history with real-time visibility into outstanding payables and cash flow impact.

free_vs_premium.title: Vendors
free_vs_premium.description: Organize and manage all suppliers and contractors in one centralized vendor management system. Store complete vendor profiles including contact details, currencies, payment terms, and compliance information. Monitor real-time vendor balances, track payment history, and analyze vendor performance over time. Gain clear visibility into outstanding obligations, strengthen supplier relationships, and maintain accurate accounts payable records across your business.

profit_loss_report.title: Purchases
profit_loss_report.subtitle: Streamlined vendor management and expense tracking system with comprehensive payable monitoring and cash flow optimization tools.

testimonials.detail: Hear from some of our amazing customers who are using Otutu.
testimonials.title: Don’t just take our word for it

automated_bookkeeping.title: Transactions
automated_bookkeeping.description: Record deposits, withdrawals, transfers, and journal entries with automatic double-entry posting, full audit trails, bulk actions, and multi-currency support — all fully integrated with your accounts.

real_time_reporting.title: Chart of Accounts
real_time_reporting.description: Manage a structured chart of accounts with parent-child hierarchies, real-time balances, standard account types, and clean reporting through active and inactive account control.

multi_currency.title: Financial Reports
multi_currency.description: Access essential financial reports including receivables and payables aging, client and vendor balances, and payment performance insights to stay on top of cash flow.

tax_compliance.title: Client & Vendor Reports
tax_compliance.description: Track client and vendor financial activity with clear aging reports, balance summaries, and payment behavior analysis for better relationship and cash-flow management.

audit_trails.title: Detailed Financial Reports
audit_trails.description: Generate professional balance sheets, income statements, trial balances, and detailed account activity reports for accurate reconciliation and decision-making.

integration.description: We support different blockchains, exchanges, and protocols to help you track, account for, and analyze your finances while protecting your privacy.

exchanges.description: Connect to a big number of centralized exchanges.
exchanges.title: Exchanges

protocols.description: More than {number}+ DeFi protocols are supported.
protocols.title: Protocols

integration.title: Connect your blockchains, connect your exchanges

jobs.description: Our mission is to help businesses take full control of their finances through transparent, auditable accounting while ensuring they retain ownership of their financial data.
jobs.title: Careers at Otutu

accept_policy.text: I have read and agreed to the {action}

pricing.custom_plan_info: Contact us to get a custom plan that suits your needs.

products.description: Otutu unifies your entire financial workflow—from offerings and invoicing to vendor bills, banking, reconciliation, and reporting. Sales, purchases, accounting, and banking are deeply integrated, ensuring consistency across every financial process. No disconnected tools. No duplicated data. Just a single source of truth for your business finances.

asset_amount_and_value.description: Get a clear, accurate view of your business’s financial position at any point in time. Otutu provides professionally structured financial statements—including balance sheets, income statements, and trial balances—built on true double-entry accounting principles. These statements help you understand profitability, cash flow, assets, liabilities, and equity, giving you the confidence to make informed financial and strategic decisions.
asset_amount_and_value.title: Financial Statements

distribution_assets.description: Gain full visibility into your customer relationships and revenue performance. Otutu’s client reports break down invoices, payments, outstanding balances, and aging details by client, allowing you to track who owes you, how long invoices have been outstanding, and overall payment behavior. These insights help you improve cash flow, manage credit terms, and maintain healthy client relationships.
distribution_assets.title: Client Reports

distribution_locations.description: Stay in control of your payables and supplier obligations with detailed vendor reporting. Otutu provides clear reports on bills, payments, outstanding balances, and aging by vendor, helping you manage due dates, plan payments, and avoid missed obligations. With complete vendor transaction histories and balance tracking, you can optimize cash flow while maintaining strong supplier relationships.
distribution_locations.title: Vendor Reports

events_analysis.description: Dive deeper into your financial data with comprehensive, transaction-level reporting. Otutu’s detailed reports provide full visibility into account movements, journal entries, and balance changes across your entire chart of accounts. From individual transaction histories to account balance summaries, these reports ensure transparency, traceability, and audit readiness across all financial operations.
events_analysis.title: Detailed Reports

detailed_graphs.description: Otutu is built for businesses that operate beyond a single currency or market. With native multi-currency support across sales, purchases, banking, and accounting, Otutu automatically handles currency conversions, exchange rate tracking, and accurate reporting. Whether you invoice international clients, pay foreign vendors, or manage multiple bank accounts, Otutu keeps your financials consistent and transparent.
detailed_graphs.title: Designed for Global and Multi-Currency Operations

enriched_transactions.description: Otutu is built with a secure multi-tenant architecture, ensuring complete data isolation between companies while maintaining performance and scalability. Each organization operates independently, with role-based access control, audit logging, and secure authentication. Your data remains private, protected, and accessible only to authorized users.
enriched_transactions.title: Secure Multi-Tenant Architecture You Can Trust

events_analysis.description: Otutu automates the repetitive and error-prone parts of accounting so you can focus on running your business. From real-time tax and discount calculations to recurring invoices, automated journal entries, bank feeds, and smart reconciliation, Otutu minimizes manual input while maintaining full control and accuracy. Automation is applied thoughtfully—enhancing productivity without hiding critical financial details.
events_analysis.title: Intelligent Automation That Reduces Manual Work

scales_with_your_need.description: Otutu goes beyond basic summaries. It delivers professional financial statements and analytical reports that help you understand not just what happened, but why it happened. Generate balance sheets, income statements, trial balances, receivables aging, payables aging, and detailed account activity reports with confidence. Sales and purchase dashboards provide insights into cash flow, payment performance, outstanding balances, and financial trends—so decisions are driven by data, not assumptions.
scales_with_your_need.title: Advanced Reporting for Real Business Decisions

history_view.description: A powerful offerings management system designed to handle both products and services with enterprise-grade flexibility. Otutu allows you to define what you sell and what you buy with precision, ensuring every offering is correctly priced, taxed, and mapped to the right accounts. With support for sellable and purchasable configurations, automatic tax associations, and built-in discount management, Otutu removes the complexity of product setup and eliminates costly configuration errors. Dynamic controls and real-time validation ensure your catalog stays accurate, scalable, and accounting-ready as your business grows.
history_view.title: Intelligent Product & Service Catalog

profit_loss_report.description: Manage your entire sales lifecycle—from quotes to cash—in one seamless system. Otutu connects estimates, invoices, recurring billing, and client balances into a single, unified workflow that gives you complete visibility into how revenue is generated, collected, and tracked. From professional invoicing with real-time calculations to automated recurring invoices and client payment analytics, Otutu ensures nothing falls through the cracks. Built-in sales dashboards provide insights into overdue invoices, payment behavior, and revenue trends, helping you stay in control of cash flow and customer relationships.
profit_loss_report.title: End-to-End Revenue Operations

user_notes.description: Take full control of expenses and supplier obligations with a purchases system built for accuracy, accountability, and cash-flow optimization. Otutu ensures every bill, payment, and vendor balance is properly tracked, categorized, and reflected in your financial records. Advanced bill management, multi-currency vendor support, bulk payments, and real-time payable monitoring give you a clear picture of what you owe and when. With detailed vendor analytics and performance tracking, you can manage supplier relationships professionally while keeping spending under control.
user_notes.title: Smart Payables & Vendor Control

validators.description: Otutu is built on true double-entry accrual accounting, ensuring every transaction is balanced, traceable, and compliant with international accounting standards. Automatic journal entry creation guarantees accuracy across sales, purchases, banking, and manual transactions. A full chart of accounts with structured hierarchy, real-time balance tracking, and clean categorization provides a solid accounting foundation. Whether you’re handling daily bookkeeping or preparing financials for stakeholders, Otutu delivers reliability you can trust.
validators.title: Enterprise-Grade Financial Accounting

data_synchronization.description: Otutu connects your bank accounts directly to your accounting system, ensuring your cash position is always accurate and up to date. Every bank movement is captured, categorized, and reconciled against your books for complete financial clarity. With support for multiple banks, multiple currencies, automated transaction feeds, and advanced reconciliation tools, Otutu removes guesswork from cash management. Detailed reconciliation reports and audit trails ensure transparency and compliance at every step.
data_synchronization.title: Complete Bank Visibility & Control

monerium_and_gnosis.heading: Otutu is not just accounting software.

monerium.description: Otutu automates the most time-consuming accounting tasks, reducing manual data entry and minimizing human error. Real-time calculations, automated tax and discount handling, recurring billing, and bulk operations work together to streamline daily operations. By enforcing accounting rules through automation, Otutu ensures consistency across all financial documents while freeing your team to focus on analysis, strategy, and business growth instead of repetitive tasks.
monerium.title: Reduce Manual Work, Eliminate Errors

gnosis_pay.description: Otutu is built for businesses managing multiple companies, teams, or clients, with security and data privacy at its core. Each organization operates in a fully isolated environment, ensuring that company data remains private, secure, and protected. Role-based access control, comprehensive audit logging, and secure authentication ensure that only the right people have access to the right information. This enterprise-grade security architecture makes Otutu reliable, compliant, and ready for professional use at scale.
gnosis_pay.title: Enterprise Security by Design

monerium_and_gnosis.title: It is a professional financial foundation for modern businesses.

staking.description: Otutu goes beyond basic summaries. It delivers professional financial statements and analytical reports that help you understand not just what happened, but why it happened. Generate balance sheets, income statements, trial balances, receivables aging, payables aging, and detailed account activity reports with confidence. Sales and purchase dashboards provide insights into cash flow, payment performance, outstanding balances, and financial trends—so decisions are driven by data, not assumptions.
staking.title: Audit-Ready by Design

sync_db_with_server.description: Otutu is designed around enterprise-grade double-entry accrual accounting, the same accounting foundation used by professional firms and regulated businesses worldwide. Every transaction automatically generates balanced journal entries, ensuring accuracy, consistency, and compliance from day one. With a structured chart of accounts, real-time balance tracking, and strict debit/credit enforcement, your financial records remain clean, auditable, and reliable as your business grows.
sync_db_with_server.title: Built on Professional Accounting Standards

timeframe.description: Move beyond basic reports with a comprehensive reporting suite designed for business owners, accountants, and finance professionals. Otutu transforms raw transaction data into clear, structured, and decision-ready financial insights. From balance sheets and income statements to receivables aging, payables analysis, and detailed account activity reports, Otutu gives you a complete view of your financial health. These reports are audit-ready, easy to understand, and suitable for banks, investors, and regulatory review.
timeframe.title: Professional Financial Intelligence

footer.description: Gain access to advanced financial reporting, compliant tax insights, seamless integrations, and greater control over your business finances—built for today’s businesses, founders, and finance teams who need clarity, accuracy, and confidence at scale.

products.heading: Unlock the Full Potential of Otutu with Premium Features
products.title: Complete Financial Operations in One Platform

unlock.description: Otutu is ideal for small to medium-sized businesses that need professional accounting without the cost, rigidity, or learning curve of traditional ERP systems. It delivers enterprise-grade functionality in a modern, intuitive platform—helping businesses operate with confidence, clarity, and control.
unlock.title: Who Otutu Is Built For

contact_section.subtitle: For media inquiries or additional information about rotki, please reach out to:
contact_section.title: Contact us

values.subtitle: Otutu exists to empower businesses and individuals to take full control of their finances—clearly, transparently, and confidently. Our mission is to make accounting understandable, auditable, and trustworthy, while ensuring businesses truly own their financial data. We believe financial systems should work for their users, not lock them in, obscure the truth, or compromise privacy.
values.title: Nice to meet you

values_section.description: At Otutu, our values are not marketing slogans—they guide how we design our software, work with customers, and make long-term decisions. They shape the product we build and the company we are becoming. Our team operates with trust and responsibility. Each person takes ownership of their work while understanding that meaningful progress comes from collaboration. We emphasize teamwork over individual stardom, shared goals over personal credit, and long-term thinking over short-term wins. Great financial software is built through consistency, care, and collective effort.

line_1.title: We Are Builders:
line_1.value: We are a team of dedicated builders who genuinely care about what we create. We don’t build features for the sake of complexity—we build systems that solve real financial problems. Our focus is on creating accounting software that delivers real-world value: clarity in numbers, confidence in decisions, and trust in the data behind every report. We believe software should earn trust through correctness, transparency, and reliability.

line_2.title: We Build with Principles:
line_2.value: Otutu is built on strong foundational principles that prioritize users over shortcuts. We believe accounting software must be understandable and auditable. Financial systems should not be black boxes. Every calculation, balance, and report should be explainable and traceable. Your financial data belongs to you—always. We design Otutu so businesses maintain control over their records, histories, and reports without unnecessary restrictions or lock-ins. Financial data is deeply sensitive. We treat privacy as a core requirement, not an afterthought. Our architecture and workflows are designed to protect user data and limit unnecessary exposure.

line_3.title: We Welcome Collaboration:
line_3.value: We believe the best systems are built together. Otutu welcomes contributors, partners, and professionals who share our mission and actively use the product themselves. Whether through feedback, integrations, extensions, or improvements, collaboration helps Otutu grow stronger and more resilient over time. We value people who are motivated by quality, integrity, and long-term impact—not quick wins.

values_section.title: Values

vision_section.description: Otutu is building the foundation for modern business finance. We envision Otutu as a single, trusted system where businesses can view, manage, and understand their entire financial operation—clearly and accurately. Otutu aspires to:

list.line_1: Be the central place to manage accounting, banking, payables, receivables, and financial reporting.
list.line_2: Provide a clear, real-time view of business performance and financial health.
list.line_3: Enable accurate monthly, quarterly, and yearly financial reporting without complexity.
list.line_4: A modular system that many contributors outside our team can extend. For example, if someone wants to integrate tax accounting rules for a specific jurisdiction, they are experts on or integrate a chain they know of.

vision_section.title: Our Vision

three_d_secure.title: Card Verification
three_d_secure.verification_message: If prompted, please complete the 3D Secure verification to continue.
three_d_secure.billing_info_replace: By confirming, this card will replace your current payment method.
three_d_secure.billing_info_reauth: Support businesses as they grow—from simple bookkeeping to multi-entity operations.
three_d_secure.billing_info_schedule: Remain extensible and adaptable, allowing the platform to evolve with new financial needs, regulations, and use cases. Otutu is designed to grow with its users, without compromising on transparency, control, or trust.
